title: Pinkscrap
alternative_title: Pink Scrap ; ピンクスクラップ
status: Pink Scrap ; ピンクスクラップ
description:
Description :
        A special edition/side story of the popular series "Namaikizakari." (Cheeky Brat) featuring the couple Tono-kun and Ami-chan! They've been dating for a year, but they still haven't progressed beyond kissing. What will become of their "first time"?! This collection of short stories also includes the elusive first one-shot version of "Namaikizakari".
The volume contains several stories.
 - Pinkstrap
- After School Aurora I 
- After School Aurora II
- Bonus Chapter 1
- Bonus Chapter 2
